issue.title: Add IPC round trip for string types (string, char, varchar, binary)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-106](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-106). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part this we should determine the most convenient way to model string types to avoid boilerplate code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-106?focusedCommentId=15271897) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Per discussion on ML we are going to remove varchar type.  I actually had some time to work on this today, my guess is I will have a PR out early next week (based on the current amount of time I have to devote to this).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-106?focusedCommentId=15374070) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 103
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/103>
